alert.note: Alert for District of Columbia (District of Columbia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 15 at 10:38AM EDT until March 15 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Washington DC, Frederick and Montgomery Counties in Maryland, and Arlington, Fairfax, Loudoun, northern Fauquier, Prince William, and Rappahannock Counties in Virginia including the independent cities of Alexandria, Fairfax, Falls Church, Manassas, and Manassas Park. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
